Reviews.Title: Poor quality
Reviews.Author: Miller
Reviews.Content: The power supply I received is low quality. I suspect the connections have problems. My camera images are so terrible and blurry use this power supply.  I would pass if you are considering this item.

Reviews.Title: A very low-end power supply,
Reviews.Author: J Fossum
Reviews.Content: Bought this power supply for a 8 camera system, since the price is good. Before I mounted it to the wall, I inspected it and checked it over.This is a OK-looking power supply. It runs quietly.  After about 2 weeks, I began experiencing problems with the units. My cameras malfunction on a regular basis. Especially at night, my cameras doesn't  show any image on the screen, while the leds are on. The images came back sometimes later, mostly in the morning. Gradually the cameras died one by one. I thought it was the cameras problem, so I replaced with new cameras. But the new cameras are gone quickly. I knew it was something else. Eventually the power supply would not turn on. I had to replace the power distributor with a new one. Surprisingly, the cameras are working fine now. They do not lose image anymore. Now I know what's the problem now. I felt very sorry to those camera sellers since I had left awful feedback for them.OK. It is my experience, that flawed power supply can damage your camera. Don't Be Surprised When Your Camera Blows Up

ProductInfo.Name: [TR W12VDC09P05A] 9ch 5A DC12V Fuse-Free CCTV Camera Power Box
